title: Emerald Teardrop Jhumka - Pachala Butta
materials: Polki Diamonds. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lustrous finish.
features: A stunning teardrop Emerald cabochon forms the centerpiece, framed by sparkling Polki diamonds. The design is rooted in traditional Jhumka aesthetics, offering a contemporary twist on a timeless classic. The Emerald is bezel-set within the gold framework, highlighted by intricate milgrain detailing.
colors: accented by the warm yellow of 22K gold and the bright sparkle of colorless Polki diamonds. A traditional and highly desirable color combination.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Equally suitable for a modern cocktail party or gala event.
description: This Jhumka represents the pinnacle of South Indian craftsmanship. The combination of a large Emerald, genuine Polki diamonds, and the high-karat gold reflects opulence and tradition. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's brilliance, while the Emerald is meticulously chosen for its rich color and clarity. The timeless design ensures it remains a cherished heirloom.
